description: This file defines a Flutter UI screen for displaying detailed information about a recipe, including image, rating, ingredients, steps, and favorites functionality. It contains a StatefulWidget with internal state management and numerous widget classes.

classes.name: RecipeDetailsScreen
classes.description: Main widget for displaying recipe details with initialization and build logic.

classes.name: _RecipeDetailsScreenState
classes.description: State class managing internal recipe data, loading state, and UI state such as checked ingredients and current step index.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: Widget displaying the recipe image and overlay info.

classes.name: _HeaderInfo
classes.description: Widget displaying the recipe title, rating, and cooking time overlayed on the header image.

classes.name: _FavoriteButton
classes.description: Button widget to toggle recipe favorite status.

classes.name: _Body
classes.description: Main content widget showing ingredients, steps, and related info.

classes.name: _IngredientsList
classes.description: List widget showing ingredients with checkboxes for toggling.

classes.name: _StepsList
classes.description: List widget showing recipe steps with tap to focus.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads recipe data using repository based on recipeId.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the entire recipe detail screen.
